header.title: Experience and Innovation
header.subtitle: About Us
header.description: Ágora Abogados combines the dynamism of a modern firm with the vast experience and leadership of our partners.

firm.title: Our Firm
firm.quote: "We provide the personalized service of a legal boutique with global reach, capabilities, and vision."
firm.description: Ágora Abogados is a law firm based in Caracas, Venezuela. We combine the dynamism and innovation of a modern firm with the vast experience and renowned leadership of our partners and team.

pillar1.title: Quality, Agility and Excellence
pillar1.desc: A team committed to delivering top-quality service to our clients and continuously improving high-performance standards.

pillar2.title: In-Depth Analysis
pillar2.desc: We are dedicated to thoroughly understanding the specific circumstances, challenges and objectives of our clients' businesses, in order to provide comprehensive legal advice.

pillar3.title: Tailored Strategies
pillar3.desc: After gaining a complete understanding of the challenges and opportunities, our innovative team will identify the best option and design customized legal strategies to achieve the best possible outcome.

pillar4.title: Agile and Precise Execution
pillar4.desc: Our team of highly recognized professionals implements solutions effectively, ensuring sustainable and long-lasting results.

value1.title: Innovation
value1.desc: We are accustomed to going beyond the conventional to develop innovative legal strategies and achieve optimal results.

value2.title: Sustainability
value2.desc: Priority on sustainable and socially responsible practices in governance and environmental matters across all operations.

value3.title: Excellence
value3.desc: Committed to continuous improvement and at the forefront of legal practices in ever-changing environments.

value4.title: Integrity
value4.desc: Highlighting ethical conduct and transparency in all interactions, fostering trust with clients and stakeholders.

value5.title: Loyalty, Trust & Collaboration
value5.desc: The pillars of our relationships. We build strong, lasting bonds based on transparency, mutual respect, and an unwavering commitment to our clients' interests.

focus1.title: Banking, Finance, Capital Markets, VC and PE
focus1.desc: Strategic legal advice to banks, brokers, and financial institutions. Expertise in international financial services, captive financing entities, and holding structures. Specialization in retail financing, consumer and automotive financing, and debtor-creditor relations.

focus2.title: Food & Agriculture
focus2.desc: Comprehensive legal support in agricultural and agro-industrial sectors. From project development and infrastructure to regulatory compliance, planting programs, and supply chain management. Designing corporate structures for regional expansion and financing.

focus3.title: Energy, Infrastructure and Environment
focus3.desc: Supporting sustainable development and project financing in the energy and infrastructure sectors, ensuring compliance and operational efficiency.

focus4.title: Healthcare & Life Sciences
focus4.desc: High-value specialized legal services in healthcare and pharmaceuticals. Focus on regulatory compliance, IP protection, distribution networks, pharmacy franchises, and specialized M&A.

focus5.title: Industrials, Manufacturing & Transportation
focus5.desc: Specialized services to transportation companies, including cable systems. Efficient structures for national market operations, addressing public law and multi-level taxation.

header.title: Join Ágora
header.subtitle: Careers
header.description: Be part of a dynamic team committed to excellence and innovative solutions in a collaborative environment.

intro.quote: "Innovation, excellence, and leadership define our path."
intro.p1: At Ágora Abogados, we continue to grow and are looking to add a <seniorLayer>Senior Lawyer</seniorLayer> with solid experience in the corporate and financial world to our team.
intro.p2: You will work alongside highly recognized professionals advising national and multinational companies on complex cross-border transactions and strategic legal matters.

profile.title: Ideal Candidate Profile
profile.req1: More than 6 years of graduate experience.
profile.req2: Previous experience in law firms, investment funds, or similar structures.
skills: Financing, Credit and Corporate Finance Transactions.

contact.text: If you meet the profile, we invite you to send your CV to:

intro.quote: "Institutional excellence begins with a single conversation."
intro.description: Whether you are a private equity fund, an institutional investor, or a strategic operator, our team is ready to provide the local clarity you need.

header.title: World-Class Expertise
header.subtitle: Our People
header.description: A multidisciplinary team of strategic legal and investment specialists.

alvaro.bio: With over 30 years of legal experience, Álvaro stands as a prominent figure in Banking, Finance, and Capital Markets. His career includes a tenure as partner at Baker McKenzie. He has provided strategic counsel to both national and international financial institutions on complex regulatory matters, project financing, and high-value transactions.

maria.bio: María Eugenia brings over three decades of legal expertise, specializing in Corporate, Real Estate, Environmental, and Sustainability law. Previously a partner at Baker McKenzie, she has advised major corporations on cross-border transactions, regulatory compliance, and sustainable development initiatives across Latin America.

jose.bio: José is an expert in Taxation and M&A with over 25 years of professional experience. Licensed to practice law in both Mexico and Venezuela, he has designed and implemented complex tax structures for multinational corporations and led significant cross-border acquisitions.

ariana.bio: Ariana leads the Labor Law practice with over 10 years of specialized experience. As a member of the Venezuelan Institute of Social Law, she provides expert guidance on employment contracts, workforce restructuring, and labor litigation for diverse industries.

lizeth.bio: Lizeth, based in Aragua, is a Civil and Commercial Litigation expert with over 25 years of experience. She represents clients in complex commercial disputes, contract law, and judicial procedures, ensuring robust legal protection across various regional jurisdictions.

marco.bio: Marco specializes in Tax Law, providing strategic counsel on fiscal compliance and litigation. He has extensive experience in both administrative and judicial tax procedures, helping clients navigate complex regulatory frameworks.

barbara.bio: Bárbara focuses on Corporate Law and Intellectual Property. She advises clients on business formation, contract negotiation, and the protection of brand assets and innovative technologies.

manuel.bio: Manuel is a specialist in Labor Law and Human Resources. He assists corporations in managing employment relationships, drafting comprehensive internal policies, and ensuring compliance with labor regulations.

dayana.bio: Dayana focuses on Corporate and Commercial Law. She supports clients through the lifecycle of their business operations, from incorporation and governance to commercial agreements and dissolution.

raul.bio: Raúl is an expert in Dispute Resolution and Litigation. He represents clients in civil and commercial cases, bringing a strategic approach to conflict mediation and courtroom representation.

rodrigo.bio: Rodrigo specializes in Public Law and Regulatory Affairs. He advises on government relations, administrative procedures, and compliance with public sector regulations.

andreina.bio: Andreína focuses on International Business and Investment Law. She assists clients in cross-border trade, foreign investment regulations, and international commercial arbitration.

fabiola.bio: Fabiola is a specialist in Environmental Law and Natural Resources. She guides organizations through environmental impact assessments, regulatory compliance, and sustainable resource management.

andrea.bio: Andrea oversees daily office operations and administrative functions. With a focus on organizational efficiency, she ensures that all logistical and supportive processes run smoothly to facilitate high-quality legal service delivery.

oriana.bio: Oriana provides essential legal support through comprehensive research, document preparation, and case management assistance. Her diligence ensures that the legal team has the foundation they need for successful outcomes.

juan.bio: Juan Francisco leads the firm's digital presence and technological integration. He focuses on leveraging digital tools to enhance client communication, operational transparency, and the overall efficiency of legal processes.

header.title: Practice Areas
header.subtitle: Our Services
header.description: Strategically advising national and multinational companies on a global scale.

m-and-a.title: Corporate and M&A
m-and-a.desc: Comprehensive advice to national and international clients on global corporate reorganizations, mergers, acquisitions, and joint ventures.
m-and-a.fullContent: Our Corporate and Mergers & Acquisitions team stands out for providing comprehensive key advice to both national and international clients on global corporate reorganizations, mergers, acquisitions, and joint ventures. With extensive industry experience and a commitment to personalized solutions, we guide our clients through every stage of their transactions, from due diligence and negotiation to post-closing integration, helping them achieve growth and success. Our expertise has positioned our team as strategic key advisors for those undertaking corporate reorganizations, optimizing corporate governance and aligning stakeholders across multiple jurisdictions in the most comprehensive, efficient, and agile manner. Our team has an outstanding track record of assisting local companies in their international expansion, as well as helping foreign companies establish themselves in our region.

banking.title: Banking & Finance
banking.desc: Strategic legal counsel to banks in regulatory matters, financial products, lending, and extensions of credit.
banking.fullContent: We provide strategic legal counsel to banks in regulatory, as well as in financial products, lending, and other extensions of credit. Our B&F team has developed a wide range of highly sophisticated finance, treasury, and foreign exchange products tailored to specific client objectives and has extensive experience in cross-border financial services, particularly with foreign banks providing such services to clients in the region. Our team has a strong, successful, and proven record in retail finance, automobile finance and specialty retail, such as in agricultural inputs and sowing programs.

capital-markets.title: Capital Markets
capital-markets.desc: Advisory services in capital markets transactions, assisting clients with securities issuances and key financial operations.
capital-markets.fullContent: We provide advisory services in capital markets transactions, assisting our clients with securities issuances and key financial operations to support their growth plans and structural financial changes, including capital strategies and debt issuance. We tailor our solutions to private equity scenarios, managing fund formation, overseeing transactions, and offering strategic guidance on investments, ensuring that our clients are well-positioned to capitalize on market opportunities and achieve substantial growth.

tax.title: Tax
tax.desc: Specialized advice in tax planning, compliance, litigation, and transfer pricing both in Venezuela and abroad.
tax.fullContent: Our Tax Practice specializes in providing high-value strategic advice in tax planning, compliance, tax litigation, and transfer pricing. With a focus on minimizing the legal and economic risks of operating both in Venezuela and abroad, we offer comprehensive services in areas such as customs, international trade, double taxation, tax benefits, project financing, mergers and acquisitions, among others. Our team also provides support in tax compliance, tax recoveries, and assistance with audits. In litigation matters, we represent our clients in tax and transfer pricing disputes, both in administrative and judicial proceedings, ensuring a strong and effective defense.

labor.title: Labor and Employment
labor.desc: Expert guidance on individual and collective labor law, contracts, employee benefits, and work visas.
labor.fullContent: Our team is renowned for offering expert guidance on a wide range of labor matters. From individual to collective labor law issues, we provide comprehensive assistance in areas such as labor contracts and agreements of all types, negotiation, employee benefits planning, downsizing, analysis, and recommendations on labor law compliance, administrative and judicial processes, as well as handling work visas for employees. We ensure full compliance with local labor laws while minimizing risks. With a practical approach and customized solutions tailored to each client, industry, and type of workforce, we help companies manage their labor force efficiently, optimize processes, and achieve their strategic operational goals.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Law and Compliance
regulatory.desc: Support in navigating local and international regulatory frameworks, AML, and economic sanctions.
regulatory.fullContent: We guide and support our clients in navigating the complexities of local and international regulatory frameworks. We assist companies in developing and implementing compliance programs, ensuring adherence to industry-specific regulations, government policies, and legal standards. From risk assessments and regulatory filings to internal audits, our team helps mitigate regulatory risks and maintain operational integrity in an ever-evolving environment. Our professionals hold international certifications in compliance and anti-money laundering, and have advised clients on counterpart verification and Due Diligence. Additionally, we provide counsel on economic sanctions regimes and facilitate the selection and interaction with foreign legal experts when our clients require foreign law opinions and/or coordination of consultations or license requests under specific economic sanctions regimes.

debt-restructuring.title: Debt Restructuring
debt-restructuring.desc: Strategic advice on restructuring financial obligations and navigating insolvency processes.
debt-restructuring.fullContent: Our Debt Restructuring practice provides strategic advice to companies seeking to reorganize their financial obligations. We guide clients through complex restructuring processes, helping them negotiate with creditors, optimize their capital structure, and navigate local and international insolvency frameworks to ensure business continuity and financial stability.

step1.title: Assessment
step1.desc: Rigorous evaluation of the market and legal landscape.

step2.title: Structuring
step2.desc: Designing a robust institutional vehicle for the objective.

step3.title: Execution
step3.desc: Local operational management and advisory support.
